cause.description:
How will you make a difference?
Your donations will help The University of Central Florida offer more services to its students. Your donation will go toward an endowment, so that if 50,000 dollars are raised, a permanent flow of 2,500 dollars will be earned every year.
You can choose which area you would like to donate:
Student Financial Need: For students whose parents have little to no money to provide for their education
Student Scholarships: To lure high school seniors with outstanding academics to UCF in order to raise the UCF average GPA and SAT scores.
Academic Capital Improvement: To help UCF build more and better classrooms, dorms, and anything else that is not for athletic purposes.
UCF Knights: For establishing new athletic programs such as men's rowing, men's and women's Lacrosse, and swimming.
1. To promote UCF to becoming a premier Reserch University
2. To help needy UCF students recieve a college degree
3. To leave UCF a better place for future UCF students for generations to come.
cause.mission: To raise funds for UCF's Endowment
